name: Konami GB Collection Vol.1
overview: Konami GB Collection Vol. 1 is a compilation developed by TOSE and published by Konami for Game Boy and Game Boy Color. Included on the cartridge: Nemesis (titled Gradius on the GBC version) Castlevania: The Adventure World Circuit Series (Konami Racing on GBC) Operation C (Probotector on GBC) Curiously, World Circuit Series is called Konami Racing despite that not being the title of the game in any region (World Circuit Series in the US, F-1 Spirit in Japan, and The Spirit of F-1 in UK)
